| 35 |  | #P_df-usp | |- UnifSp = { w | ( ( UnifSt ` w ) e. ( UnifOn ` ( Base ` w ) ) /\ ( TopOpen ` w ) = ( unifTop ` ( UnifSt ` w ) ) ) } |
